titles.title: Authorizing the Rotunda of the Capitol to be used on September 19, 2002, for a ceremony to present the Congressional Gold Medal to General Henry H. Shelton (USA, Ret.).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Ehlers asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/17/2002--Passed House without amendment. Authorizes use of the Rotunda of the Capitol on September 19, 2002, to present the Congressional Gold Medal to General Henry H. Shelton.
